title: 77/773/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 November 1977 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 23 November 1977  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in France pursuant to Directive 75/268/EEC  (Only the French text is authentic)  (77/773/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Articles 8 to 13 of decree No 77-566 of 3 June 1977 on mountain and hill farming and farming in certain less-favoured areas and the order of 3 June 1977 on aid granted to certain categories of farmers in less-favoured areas satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measure referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.

The provisions existing in France for implementation of the reform of agricultural structures pursuant to Directive 72/159/EEC continue, having regard to Articles 14 to 20 of decree No 77-566 of 3 June 1977 on mountain and hill farming and farming in certain less-favoured areas, to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measure referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 November 1977.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1.
